pr_title: Switch from MySQL -> MariaDB driver + 2 minor fixes

timeline.message:
Prevents warnings in case a statistical Clickhouse query is slow.

In this special case, this is kind of unexpected, however, as these
implementation might serve as template, we rather want it to be complete.

No longer removes files / blobs from the work or tmp directory as long as these are accessed.

This permits to keep export templates etc. in the work directory.
Switches from MySQL to MariaDB as the MySQL-Driver has security issues.
Switches from MySQL to MariaDB as the MySQL-Driver has security issues.

timeline.message:
Marks static parts of optional frameworks as nullable.

Otherwise we receive a bunch of startup warnings if the framework
isn't enabled, even if the underlying code is never run
(as static parts are always injected).

Uses a more generic framework so that the L3Uplink also works with custom tenants.

E.g. MEMOIO uses a custom user management and still needs access to the storage.
Uses a proper field to build a constraint.
